title: She revises her hifz during certain prayers, is this innovation #quran #allah #islam assim al hakeem
transcript: Shake I had a question that I a student of HS alhamdulillah I have to revise the old verses of HS every day so I recite the verses of HS of Surah Al bakar during Z ass and Isha prayers and I recite zma during fuz prayers will this be an innovation no there is no problem in what you're doing at all you can select whatever you want to revive in your prayers regardless there's no innovation in that
